Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: Green Line Line trains are standing at Garfield due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line Line trains are standing at Garfield due to fire department activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #55 Garfield and #3 King Drive.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
